Key Match Events: Montenegro scored a late consolation goal
Pre-Game Insights: Wales were looking to complete the double over Montenegro
Craig Bellamy's first win as Dragons boss
Wales had failed to score in previous four games but raced into a two-goal lead within three minutes
Post-Match Reflections: A second victory against Montenegro would boost Wales' hopes of topping Group B4
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales v Montenegro will be shown live on S4C with live coverage from 7:20pm
Can also live stream on BBC iPlayer and Viaplay International YouTube channel
Radio coverage available on BBC Radio Wales, BBC Radio Cymru, and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra
